message: It's still night out when we leave Glitter. Pretty weird, since we've already been here a whole day.
I guess that's just how things are in Platinum Jail, but there's something kinda scary about a neverending night.
I wonder how the other guests feel.
Unable to shake my discomfort, I head down the main street with Clear, following the map on the invitation.
As we get close to Oval Tower, Clear tugs on my sleeve.

name: クリア
message: "Master. I have to tell you something."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What?"

name: クリア
message: "The truth is..."
Clear leans close, his voice an exaggerated whisper.

name: クリア
message: "I think I might know who can get us into the tower."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Really?"

name: クリア
message: "Yes. And they're nearby."

name: 蒼葉
message: "How do you know? And how did you―"

name: クリア
message: "Shh!"
He touches a gloved finger to my lips.

name: クリア
message: "He's behind us right now. Don't worry. I'm sure he knows."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Are you serious?"

name: クリア
message: "Yes. One moment."
Clear spins around.
I turn with him, and there, right behind us, is...

name: クリア
message: "Mr. Policemaaa―brghgahhaghm!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "You idiot!"
I grab Clear's mask from behind and pull hard.

name: クリア
message: "You're so mean, Master! Why'd you stop me?!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "What do you think you're doing?! That's a fucking cop!"
Clear cocks his head to the side, puzzled.

name: クリア
message: "Yes, but they say you should always ask a policeman if you need help. I'm sure he knows about the tower."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Do you understand what we're trying to do here?!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "They think we're terrorists, remember?! We have to keep a low profile! Don't ever do that again!"

name: クリア
message: "Oh, right! We're terrorists!"
He claps his hands together.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Gimme a fucking break..."

name: クリア
message: "What about that person over there? He looks like he knows something."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Huh?"
He walks off before I can react.
